citoid-520-error: Unable to retrieve information from the provided identifier.
citoid-citeFromIDDialog-use-general-dial: Or use the $1 to fill in the details yourself.
citoid-citeFromIDDialog-use-general-erro: We couldn't make a citation for you. You can make one by using the $1.
